analysis.description:
Crowdsale.fallback (/unique_contracts/0x8ae5a3d3107699b379898e25013e4b71a227ea22.sol#35-73) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(sendETH) (/unique_contracts/0x8ae5a3d3107699b379898e25013e4b71a227ea22.sol#62-63)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.fallback (/unique_contracts/0x8ae5a3d3107699b379898e25013e4b71a227ea22.sol#35-73):
	External calls:
	- tokenFree = sharesTokenAddress.balanceOf(this) (/unique_contracts/0x8ae5a3d3107699b379898e25013e4b71a227ea22.sol#35-36)
	- sharesTokenAddress.transfer(msg.sender,tokenToBuy) (/unique_contracts/0x8ae5a3d3107699b379898e25013e4b71a227ea22.sol#56-57)
	External calls sending eth:
	- owner.transfer(actualETHTransfer) (/unique_contracts/0x8ae5a3d3107699b379898e25013e4b71a227ea22.sol#52)
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - actualETHTransfer) (/unique_contracts/0x8ae5a3d3107699b379898e25013e4b71a227ea22.sol#54-55)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleClosed (/unique_contracts/0x8ae5a3d3107699b379898e25013e4b71a227ea22.sol#59-60)
	- tokenFree (/unique_contracts/0x8ae5a3d3107699b379898e25013e4b71a227ea22.sol#58-59)
